long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Putlocker official - Putlocker - Putlockers is a very helpful extension for finding movies and tv show information in the internet. You can search movie information by name, by director and by star

In this time, Putlocker is a big branch for movies streaming platform niche. There are many websites cloned with this branch. But they are fake sites. It offers ads for annoying users and maybe make money from this. But this extension does not do that.

With some lines of code but this extension is powerful search engine that help you find favorite movie information like putlockers platform instead of.

You can search for movies and tv show information online quickly and perfectly on this extension

How to use this extension?
First, you should install extension by click on text "Add to Google Chrome". Then Google will asking your for confirmation. You should allow it because you can trust on Google, right?
Wait for some seconds, when extension installed, you will see Putlocker official - Putlocker - Putlockers extension on top right place. Click on the icon, It will show search form.
Now you can search any movies and tv shows information quickly via this extension.

I hope this guide will help you on finding your favorite movies information in the internet.

Thanks, Putlocker
